page.title: 14Foxley Grove Nursing Home.
page.content: This is the only nursing home in our area and was opened two years ago. There are{15 patients,}none of whom were born locally.They came from Eton, Windsor and Staines and other places as far away as Devon and Kent.They are all there for{medical reasons.}One of them is blind but she enjoyed talking to us and was very interesting.Some of the patients had wheelchairs to get around.The home has a big garden which can be seen from many of the rooms.The {doctor}comes once a week unless called out specially and a{physiotherapist}is there 3 days a week.The ladies like having the{hairdresser}who calls once a fortnight.A{dentist}comes regularly for check-ups or treatment.The mobile library is round every 3 weeks and brings big print books and tapes.The patients only occasionally get out and about so they enjoy having visitors.
